name: Weavile
author: Kagemaru Himeno
flavor_text: They live in cold regions, forming groups of four or five that hunt prey with impressive coordination.

poke_power.name: Dark Engage
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Each of your Active Pokémon’s type is {D} until the end of your turn. If that Pokémon is no longer your Active Pokémon, this effect ends.

attacks.name: Shadow Charge
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 {D} Energy cards and attach them to any of your Pokémon in any way you like. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Chip Off
attacks.effect: If your opponent has 6 or more cards in his or her hand, discard a number of cards without looking until your opponent has 5 cards left in his or her hand.
